result.reason: User requests the ability to use Smart Sizing (bitmap scaling) in conjunction with a fixed Custom Resolution, which is currently not supported as Smart Sizing is tied to the 'Smart Size' resolution mode.
result.approach: Add 'SmartSizing' boolean property to ConnectionInfo and AbstractConnectionRecord. Update RdpProtocol.SetResolution to apply SmartSizing property to the RDP client. Update XML/SQL/CSV serializers and inheritance logic to persist the new property. Expose in UI.
